properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM POST WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , MEM_NICK , POST_NAME , POST_VIEW , POST_LIKE , TO_CHAR(POST_MODIFY, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "POST_MODIFY" , POST_NOTICE FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER ON (POST_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE P.POST_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY POST_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
